name: Micro Grotto
description:
Micro Grotto is a puzzle platformer based around the theme "Small World" for Ludum Dare 38. You play as a small cloaked featureless creature that has to traverse a set of 8 small rooms on a small island of stone filled with human objects that act as dangers to find the legend of the village.

## Controls

- [UP] - Jump

- [LEFT / RIGHT] - Move

- [DOWN] - Enter Doors

- [ENTER] - Menu confirm

- [R] - Restart Level

- [F4] - Toggle Fullscreen

- [F1] - Toggle FPS counter!

Link to LDJam submission - https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/$22935
